price: Wewe si chochote ila ni mtu kama sisi. Basi lete Ishara ukiwa wewe ni miongoni mwa wasemao kweli.
arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا فَأۡتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: Wewe si chochote ila ni mmoja unaye fanana na sisi kwa ubinaadamu, basi yawaje uwe bora kuliko sisi kwa Unabii na Utume? Na ukiwa wewe ni mkweli katika madai yako basi lete muujiza wa kuonyesha uthibitisho wa Utume wako.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā anta illā basharun mith'lunā fati biāyatin in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
